website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Storm 2 places some notable improvements to the fresh series, but the inconsistent design and imbalanced fit fell a bit flat to those who wanted the next big thing given by the company. It’s a very agreeable neutral running shoe for those who need adequate cushioning and reliable durability.
pros: Low profile construction for added flexibility and freedom of movement
Many testers have noted the positive effects of being comfortable while wearing the Gel Storm 2
The padded collar and tongue of this running shoe would increase the depth of the lockdown fit for those who want to keep their feet in place
Reviews were agreeable when it comes to the shoe’s durability
The removable sock liner would allow some medical orthotics as an option
Many wearers appreciated its lightweight nature, despite the amount of features that have been added in it
cons: A sizeable number of testers criticized the narrow fit of this shoe
Some felt that their feet were crammed inside the shoe and unable to relax and be in a neutral position
Some treated the design of the upper a bit plain and simple
There were those who questioned the structural integrity of the upper fabric

customer_reviews.title: Look great, fit great, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of these. I also have the black and green. The shoes are very durable. My heel tends to create holes in the heel of my shoes. These have lasted longer than most and I walk/run several miles almost every day. They seem a bit tight when you first put them on but very quickly they stretch just enough to hug your feet just right.
customer_reviews.author: BumpAndRun

customer_reviews.title: Stand true to their name
customer_reviews.text: As is tradition asics are the best common shoe for running, walking, standing, and these prove no different. Very light, breathe well, and are comfy to wear all day long. I used them mainly for running and experienced no break-in period and was able to use them and not get any blisters. Most of my runs consisted of 3-10 miles on indoor track, sidewalk, or treadmill
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Anderson

customer_reviews.title: THE MEN'S SIZES RUN SMALL, TOO!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews for the women's and the men's styles of shoes from this manufacturer. The women's shoes reviews repeatedly mentioned the shoes running small, but the men's shoes reviews indicated that they were pretty true to size. Not true! I chose the men's size that was indicated on the conversion chart, but the shoes were still VERY snug on my foot. I returned them for a whole size larger, and that did the trick. The larger shoes fit wonderfully and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid fan of the Asics running shoes, and have been for quite some time. I purchased this shoe as a walking, rather than running, shoe. It is nice and light and offers plenty of cushion for walking. It does run a bit smaller than other running shoes from Asics. My suggestion is that if you are going to use it as a running shoe, give yourself an extra 1/2 size compared to other Asics shoes. To those that prefer a light weight shoe and do need the extra cushion, as do I, this shoe may work very well
customer_reviews.author: keith 13

customer_reviews.title: small fit but still comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got this on sale and 9d was only size left that was close to my size of 9E so I bought them hoping for the best. I lost in size but I did try them on and wear them for a day and even though they are too small for me they were still pretty comfortable so I think I'll order the right size which should be even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Danny H. Newport

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I have had quick a few pairs of ASICS so I decided to order these on special. They are OK, but really too snug. I was surprised at the fit on this shoe vs other pairs I have in size 11. My dress shoe is more like a 10 or 10,5 but always order 11s for sneakers or running shoes. Really realy snug fit, quite surprised, but I wlll keep them in hopes they strecth out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Z MAN

customer_reviews.title: Misleading size is a fraudulent sale
customer_reviews.text: I'm calling foul on the size of these shoes. I'm a 10.5 and these shoes were purchased at a 10.5 and they did not fit. My father squared them up with one look and they fit on his feet fine. He grabbed a pair of his 8.5 shoes stacked the base of that shoe to this 10.5 shoe and they were equally sized. Do not buy this shoe unless you want to return it and take a shipping return loss.
customer_reviews.author: Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: They run 1/2 size small...order accordingly
customer_reviews.text: I have worn ASICS for 10+ years and always wear the same size, no matter the model (Kayano, Nimbus, etc.). HOWEVER, the Gel Storm 2 runs a bit small. I recommend ordering 1/2 size larger than you typically wear. Other than size, these are terrific shoes. They are very light and provide adequate support when you are on your feet all day but not necessarily working out. They serve my intended purpose as "every day" shoes to save wear and tear on my Kayanos.
customer_reviews.author: G. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: Following the other reviews I ordered my son the highest of his normal size range. That didn't work so I ordered another half size up (the largest paiir of shoes he's every owned). That was perfect. I hade a similar experience with asics for myself. I range between a 7- 8 in shoes. I ordered a 8.5 in asics and they fit right.
customer_reviews.author: informed consumer

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Buy a size or 2 up. They run exceptionally small for the marked size. Enough that I considered the fact that I may have bought women's shoes when I put them on. After wearing them s while the do loosen up somewhat, however not enough that I'd consider another pair of Asics as I need a 15 for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Drew M Lewis

customer_reviews.title: half size smaller than usual
customer_reviews.text: smaller than my actual size, I used to have 11.5 asic, and had no problem so I order the same size with this one. Apparently it's little bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: piboon thongtanyong

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable but I might end up getting a half size ...
customer_reviews.text: smaller fit, I always buy the ASICS Gel styles online in 11.5 but this one was a tad smaller than the previous 4 or 5 pairs I've been through. They are comfortable but I might end up getting a half size bigger next time. Think they would be the same since it's the same shoe.
customer_reviews.author: christopher frederick

customer_reviews.title: Plan on ordering at least half a size larger than you normally would
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered running and other athletic shoes from a variety of manufacturers many times in the past. These running shoes are by far the smallest I have ordered and I would say they are at least a full 1/2 size smaller than advertised. I am hoping they will stretch out with use, but after two weeks they are still very tight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Nevias

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: CAUTION! The size is way off. I wear a size 11 ( I measured in shoe store, Im not guessing). I ordered a size 11.5 based off of other reviews and I wish i would have gone with a 12. Asics are probably the worst shoe I've purchased. The shoes wear out so quickly and the sizing isn't even close.
customer_reviews.author: SLC Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: Although I ordered the size I wear, the shoe was a little tight, being a bit narrow. The length of the shoe is perfect. After a bit of s struggle, I am able to put them on, and after a few minutes the shoes seem to stretch enough to be comfortable and wearable. Only fault I have is the shoe is a bit narrow in width.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son when I saw the Lightning Deal price which was awesome. He wears sneakers till they fall off his feet so I took advantage of the great price cause I run in Asics, and love them. He was very happy when he saw them and when he put them on, he said they felt like "pillows on his feet". Good job, Mom!
customer_reviews.author: Agnes O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes with style
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes with style, good for walking but they don't provide the best arch support for running. Also these shoes run small, so if you are going to order these, buy a size bigger, and they are also narrow shoes. I am a size 8.5M and I had to order a 9M and they fit, but they were a little narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Veliz

customer_reviews.title: nice sneakers...not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Asics fan, so when Amazon had this sale, I jumped on it. Unfortunately, Asics has a lot of different models, and this one just did not feel like what I am used to, including being too tight. I'm not saying that these are good or bad, just that they were not comfortable for me
customer_reviews.author: S. Hooper

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: A little on the small side but a very comfortable shoe. That's my theme these days.. COMFORT. I wear at work and walk around the hospital all day with them. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doc978

customer_reviews.title: I love the ASICS brand
customer_reviews.text: I love the ASICS brand! I work as a server and run around all night on concrete floors. These feel a little small for the first time I put them on compared to all the other styles I have tried. Great deal though and would definitely recommend and purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome chad

customer_reviews.title: Fits like it was made for my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I am a bit skeptical buying clothes or shoes online as they can vary too much but this worked out great. Asics are a great shoe and the gel adds another level of comfort. Thanks Amazon for giving all of the different glances of the shoe. My next pair of shoes will be bought on Amazon as well.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stephen Goode

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Based on other people's reviews, I ordered this product a half size larger than I would otherwise have thought necessary and the fit is quite snug but good. They have held up well and are reasonably comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bee

customer_reviews.title: Would have been nice
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were light and seemed like they would have been good. But they were to tight and narrow for my wide feet. I typically wear 9.5 and ordered size 10. They were still too tight and I was afraid my wide feet would tear through the sides soon enough. So returned and will keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: gogogut

customer_reviews.title: If you are "between sizes" go with the larger choice.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, nice light material. These are comfortable with and without socks. Over the years, my feet have gone from men's 10.5 to 10. I'm kind of "between sizes". Based on reviews, I went with 10.5 and the fit was perfect. 10 would have been too small.
customer_reviews.author: N. Krumpe

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but order a bigger size
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read the reviews first and saw that they run small. My husband wears a size 9 in his current ASICS but I ordered a 9.5. They just fit. Wouldn't have wanted them any smaller. The comfort is not as great as the Gel Nimbus shoe, but for 1/3 the price, it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lab monkey mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shoe during a Lightening Deal. I only bought them because of the great price. The shoes ran a little small so I suggest 1/2 size larger. It is just a decent shoe. Nothing special. I would consider another shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M. M.

customer_reviews.title: size isn't quite right
customer_reviews.text: Got it about a size and half ( european ) larger than what i usually wear when i read the reviews about the size ... still doesnt fit so well ... maybe it will stretch out a bit more after more use
customer_reviews.author: Zaher

customer_reviews.title: I like the fit and design
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and design. I would suggest getting half or one size bigger than the regular size. very comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.author: Wahmed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support for about 4 months in the OR
customer_reviews.text: Wore these for about 4 months in the OR, on my feet all day. The soles wore out but that's expected when you work 40-50 hours and you're on your feet all day. Asics is my preferred running shoe brand for work for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Silly Goose

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was too small. Usually wear a size 9, I bought 9.5 after reading the reviews thinkin that it's going to be ok.....oh how wrong I was the 9.5 was still to small and the shoe is very narow it hurts like hell. I had already pulled the tags out don't know if I would be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Reshma

customer_reviews.title: Hole in a month!
customer_reviews.text: runs small--order up a full size at least. major issue is they have a hole 1 month after getting them! the soft upper shoe is comfortable, but if they wear through in a month, it's not worth it. would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: bogey

customer_reviews.title: Fit is not the same as my other ASICS shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting a great deal on these shoes as my Doctor recommends ASICS for people with plantar fasciitis. Well, they are certainly smaller than my ASICS GT1000's. COnsequently, my teenage son gets a new pair of shoes which he really didn't need.
customer_reviews.author: Hoosiers!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes!
customer_reviews.text: First off, the shoes came earlier than expected, which was great. Second, I was relieved to see that they fit perfectly! I had ordered the same shoe size as the last Asics running shoes I purchased, and they fit well! The gel padding on the heel were definitely helpful, especially on the first run! Overall, I am most impressed. They fit well, they are comfortable for longer distances, and they are aesthetically pleasing!
customer_reviews.author: Ameen Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Sneakers are as beautiful as in the picture but although they are the ...
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers are as beautiful as in the picture but although they are the right size in length and width the we're too tight for my husband feet. Luckily I found a buyer for them. Delivery was on time. Price was great.
customer_reviews.author: leonidas45

customer_reviews.title: Next Larger Size was too small.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one size larger than my normal athletic shoe size. Felt very cramped after briefly walking around the house. Returned to Amazon for credit. I'll stick with New Balance from now on. I can fairly well predict their fit for online orders.
customer_reviews.author: J and G G

customer_reviews.title: Way too small.  Go up by 1 full size.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style of thew shoe but it is made way too small. I read the reviews and upsized by 1/2 and it was still tight. Need to up the size by when you order. Same thing happened with the pair I bought for my wife. I've been wearing Aiscs for 20 years and have always been a 11 1/2. I ordered the 12 and it was too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Wasted Talent

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I was switching from my Gel-Nimbus 15's to these and safe to say the shoe runs a bit narrow. Had to re-lace them for my high arches. Pretty comfortable shoes for road and trail running. I'm in college and walk a lot from class to class and these shoes are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Krizman

customer_reviews.title: Goo on the Shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived promptly in the mail so all was good. To my dismay when I opened the box, the shoes had markings on it and some noticeably weird glue that was visible. These are supposed to be brand new shoes and this is completely unacceptable. The shoes look great but with my experience I might steer clear due to the problems I experienced.Overall the shoes ooh good and do fit small and narrow. I normally wear a 9.5 and ordered the 10.5 and they fit very feel but are a bit snug
customer_reviews.author: David Lipson

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit small
customer_reviews.text: Nice sneaker. I've been wearing Asics for years, but found these run a bit on the narrower side. They do have give and after a few days were more comfortable, but you may want to consider going a half size up if you decide to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Krasinski

customer_reviews.title: good lookin but too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Good lookin shoe except the stitching on the tongue of one was messed up. Also I usually wear a 9.5-10 depending on the brand. Based on the reviews I ordered a 10.5. My toes are right at the end which isnt bad on the length but its way to narrow of a shoe. Cuts off the circulation even. And I dont have narrow feet. My old asics are not this narrow.
customer_reviews.author: L3

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes - very small
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, good price, but these are the smallest sized shoes I have ever bought (I am 55, have bought many). I normally wear a 9.5 or 10. I ordered these at 10 1/2 because of other reviews. I had to exchange those for size 11. They fit good. I have never bought a size 11 in any other shoe. However, return transaction was as easy as possible. Submitted for return online, printed a sheet to put in the box, UPS picked up the shoes the next day, and Amazon delivered (via UPS) the replacement shoes on the 2nd day. So overall I am very satisfied and the shoes wear good.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Perry

customer_reviews.title: Won't fit even I ordered with larger size.
customer_reviews.text: the size is problematic. I ordered a pair with +0.5 size larger, its length fits me, but its height is not right -- too tight, push my the back of my feet. Uncomfortable. Do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: zhiyi

customer_reviews.title: Okay Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: At first, i disliked these shoes because hey weren't as comfortable as i thought they would be compared to other shoes I've bought around the same price. After trying them a few times, I can say that they are more comfortable than i thought they would be on runs, walks, and running casual errands. Its an okay running shoe but not the best that I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe review
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1/2 size larger after reading reviews and recommendations. Shoes were still too small. If I were ever to order again (doubtful) I would order a full size larger. Why do foreign made shoes fit in smaller sizes?
customer_reviews.author: Harlon Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Gel Storm 2
customer_reviews.text: Fits okay. For me it feels like it has no cushioning and little support. The soles of the shoes have the appearance of being cheap plastic, but I don't know if they really are. Still in the break in process.
customer_reviews.author: timmary5

customer_reviews.title: Do not fit at all
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of Asics running shoes and ordered the exact same size. They were way too small, so I returned them and exchanged them for the next size up. My toes still bunch up. How can the same company have the same shoe not be the same size as marked?
customer_reviews.author: Travis J.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are definitely comfortable. Not sure how I feel about them for ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are definitely comfortable. Not sure how I feel about them for running, I will update when I have worn them running more(only worn once on a run).
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Like almost everyone before me said
customer_reviews.text: Like almost everyone before me said, these shoes are just too small. It's baffling that there should be so much disparity in sizing between ASICS products, because I've owned a pair of great ASICS shoes before this that I liked very much. These shoes are definitely not great for running, and are not that great for walking either.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Chatterjee

customer_reviews.title: These run small.
customer_reviews.text: Order at least a size up, they do stretch a bit but you need at least a size up. Once you get the right size they are comfortable, not sure about running as they do not feel like they give a mega amount of support.
customer_reviews.author: AJWKM

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and stability are great. Not sure they breathe all that well
customer_reviews.text: Other Asics shoes I've owned have been a half-size bigger. Comfort and stability are great. Not sure they breathe all that well, as my feet got fairly hot within 3-4 hours outdoors. Good winter shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Porter

customer_reviews.title: Problems with the size.
customer_reviews.text: Last time i bought a pair of Asics Gel Neo33 in Size 8.5 and didn't have problems with the Size, now i bought a new model with the same Size and came too small (like a number less)
customer_reviews.author: MAXIM

customer_reviews.title: Very light!!
customer_reviews.text: Very snug fit but I should have remembered that Asics are on the small size. They are super light, colors looks really nice (I was kind of leary on the screen).....should be able to get thinner socks and get past the sizing. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend a full size larger
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size bigger than normal and still quite snug. I would recommend a full size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Opinions for free

customer_reviews.title: I wear them without the insert and like them. I am saving the insert for my ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe insert made it to tight to fit my foot without really loosening or removing the insert.I wear them without the insert and like them.I am saving the insert for my other shoes
customer_reviews.author: greory dougherty

customer_reviews.title: I bit snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I usually where an 11 1/2 or 12 so I ordered the size 12. They are still a bit snug and also have a narrower toe box than do the Brooks Adrenalines I am used to. Very lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: C. Coulson

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE WALKING SHOES
customer_reviews.text: THESE TEND TO RUN SOME WHAT SNALL SO I GOT A SIZE 11 INSTEAD ON 10 AND ONE HALF. THEY CUSHION YOUR FEET AND FEEL GREAT WHEN I AM DOING MY WALKING EXERCISE. GREAT SHOE!
customer_reviews.author: Reed A. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: I usually am quite comfortable wearing a size 7D
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run small. I usually am quite comfortable wearing a size 7D, but my toes are right at the tip of the shoe which makes going downhill particularly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework
customer_reviews.text: I searched through other reviews and ordered a half size larger based on what I found and they fit great. (I wear an 11 and I ordered an 11.5) I have a narrow foot but they run a little narrow so it is all good. I don't tend to buy without a good search for reviews espescially shoes. Price, style and product were great otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Gus Denzik

customer_reviews.title: runs really smaller
customer_reviews.text: Runs really small. Order at least a size larger. Not suited for medium to wide foot. It is comfortable and amazingly light
customer_reviews.author: Jake111

customer_reviews.title: wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The shoe seems OK. However, there is a sizing issue. The shoes are stamped with the correct size, but these are just too short. These are a 11.5 not a 12. They will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Estrada

customer_reviews.title: 5 that fit perfect. These shoes say 9
customer_reviews.text: I have over a dozen pairs of shoes all 9.5 that fit perfect. These shoes say 9.5 men's but I can't even get my foot into them. I can only assume they are miss marked. Too bad looking forward to give em a try.
customer_reviews.author: average user

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful replacement
customer_reviews.text: My original Asics are the Phoenix and have been trying to find a good replacement. After looking and trying on other Asics and not wanting to go to a different brand I purchased the Asics GT100's that I ended up giving away with only 5-6 run in them, so I decided to try these. As with the comments stating they run a bit small I ordered these in a half size bigger, glad I did, although the toe box seems to be a bit tight initially. I am hopeful that the toe box stretches because the rest of the shoe fits great. I'll update comments as time and a few runs are in.
customer_reviews.author: old flyer

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a little snug. I haven't gone running yet, but Asics shoes seem to provide better cushion than others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: axle

customer_reviews.title: Too small!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is the size of running shoes I use but they simply do not fit. Looks like the sizes they use are not well designed. First and last time I buy ASICS.
customer_reviews.author: GEK

customer_reviews.title: Unusual for Asics
customer_reviews.text: My usual size was so small I had to return them. I never encountered that with Asics before. I guess I'll have to go the brick & mortar route, or change brands.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but too narrow for my foot
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great other than being too narrow for my foot. If they made a wide width shoe I'd exchange them rather than returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C. Harnish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the gym
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my husband. He normally wears a 9.5, so that is what I ordered. He said they were a little snug, but not too tight. He really likes that they are light weight and loves the colors. Perfect for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Walker

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews the shoes ran small, I ordered a 9 for my husband, he ordinarily wears 8 1/2. Well...it was too small. So I then ordered a 9 1/2, it is long enough but now too narrow. I give up! lol
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: My feet are small and not too wide they fit fine.
customer_reviews.text: I jump rope and jog and go to the gym with these. My feet are small and not too wide they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: 5'7 175 lbs shopper

customer_reviews.title: Order one size larger.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return 9 1/2. Always wear 9 1/2 but need a 10 in these shoes. Can not get them for the same price since they were a deal of the day.
customer_reviews.author: bnjdavid

customer_reviews.title: NOT Asics quality!
customer_reviews.text: Left shoe was markedly more narrow than right...painfully so, Had already ordered up a half size from normal size, Cheap-looking detailing and sewing. Item returned.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I would have returned them for a larger size but the package didn't include any instructions on how to do that. They'll work though.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rusk

customer_reviews.title: Great price though
customer_reviews.text: Really narrow. Gave them to a friend with skinny feet. Great price though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffbobeff

customer_reviews.title: Returned - Way too small
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were nice but WAY undersized. We actually ordered a half-size bigger and they were still too tight. Probably would have been a five star product...
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: nice and light
customer_reviews.text: nice and light. Pretty good value. Now that it is getting colder out, I can see I won't wear them out as much becuase the air blows right through them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In Search of comfy sneakers? Search no further!
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome! They seem to run small, so I got .5 size up and have never looked back since! They endured three straight hours of tennis and my feet didn't get even slightly tired/sore!
customer_reviews.author: Boston Sean

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sizes run at least one size too small
customer_reviews.text: The show might be a good shoe, but the sizes definitely run smaller than normal. Order 1 1/2 sizes larger than you normally wear (in my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I love how light they are while still providing cushioning
customer_reviews.text: My long distance shoe. I love how light they are while still providing cushioning. I'm run marathons in these.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: Great but run a little small
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes, but buy 1/2 a size larger than you normally do.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews stating ASICs run small. So I purchased a full size larger than my normal foot size. These fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Runs a full size small!
customer_reviews.text: Even ordering this shoe a half size larger than I normally wear, it is STILL too small. They are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Dogg

customer_reviews.title: Size 13 was small
customer_reviews.text: Just runs small. I own or have owned 5-6 different models of Asics. All other Size 13 fit very well. These were too short.
customer_reviews.author: Outdoor guy

customer_reviews.title: Runs way small
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe just fine but this style runs ridiculously small for some reason. I even have another pair of similar Asics running shoes in size 10 that fit perfectly. Baffling.
customer_reviews.author: fox1at

customer_reviews.title: Good for everyday
customer_reviews.text: I have noted that some reviews say that these are smaller, and actually they might feel that way because soft tops are just slightly narrow; however, this goes away on the next day of use. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes but I usually wear a 12
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes but I usually wear a 12. These 12s are pretty snug. Should have gone a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a good running shoe. I ran four miles one day with no problem. Kudos
customer_reviews.author: Malachi Bryant

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Thirteen is usually a little big for me but seldom find a 12 1/2. These shoes in thirteen are very snug, just barely wearable. They are comfortable otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Tex

customer_reviews.title: Little small
customer_reviews.text: I reallly like it, are nice, beauty, but are more small that other brands ,
customer_reviews.author: Bernarda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is much too small, even though I bought a larger size. Definitely would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes feel great. Nice and light. Just a tad snug on my left foot. Hold up well when running in them.
customer_reviews.author: John Barone

customer_reviews.title: Order at least 1/2 size larger than you wear in other brands.
customer_reviews.text: ASICS makes a great shoe, but order at least a 1/2 size larger than you wear in a Nike or other major brand.
customer_reviews.author: SnoopyDog4Good

customer_reviews.title: Way Smaller than Expected.
customer_reviews.text: As mentioned by previous reviewers, they are waaay smaller than advertised. I'm a 10.5, got them size 11, they were still tight without socks on, which made them perfect for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Mannytaur

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These do not fit like other asics I have purchased. The soles are flatter and the overall fit is tighter.
customer_reviews.author: kvl

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I wore around house for awhile,, but hurt my feet. had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Clair

customer_reviews.title: 5 I ordered feels more like a 9
customer_reviews.text: The 9.5 I ordered feels more like a 9. The width is OK. Otherwise it is a nice shoe. I may have to toss them.
customer_reviews.author: Geoman

customer_reviews.title: order at least 1/2 larger
customer_reviews.text: I wear 12 in all other brands. 12 1/2 needed in this ASICS shoe. Naturally no 12 1/2 available in granite/black/malibu.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: and I really loved the price
customer_reviews.text: My son really loves these shoes, and I really loved the price.
customer_reviews.author: V. Amos

customer_reviews.title: Great Look, Bad Width
customer_reviews.text: All of the mesh-type running shoes that I've tried are way too narrow. ASICS, New Balance, it doesn't matter. Even the 4E width, which is rarely available, is too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: FOURTH PAIR I HAVE ORDERED. I ORDER ONE SIZE LARGER BECAUSE PRIOR ORDERS WERE TOO SMALL.
customer_reviews.author: William A. King

customer_reviews.title: this product does not fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: even though I have bought size 10M Asics before this is too small.
customer_reviews.author: German

product_meta.title: Asics - Mens Gel-Storm 2 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Gel-Stormï¿½ 2 combines a low-profile midsole with a visible rearfoot GEL-Cushioning System providing excellent cushioning in a lightweight package. The comfortable seamless upper fit is achieved by a combination of breathable engineered mesh and minimal but supportive reinforcements.
feature_bullets: This shoes / sandals / boots style name or model number is Gel-Storm 2
